Title: Damage Control
Writer: Courtney A. Kemp (created by), Heather Zuhlke, Jeff Dix (executive story editor), Monica Mitchell (story editor), Gabriela Uribe (staff writer), Andre J. Ferguson (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: The St. Patrick family grieves Raina while the AUSA's office discusses taking down "Ghost" and ending Angela's career. Councilman Tate exploits Raina's death. Dre maintains order within his organization.
